issue.title: [CI] Add Debian 10 nightly builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14491](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14491). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Debian 10 docker builds are broken. Fix them, and add to nightly builds.
